sect1.title: MIN

row.entry: The set of records to process. This may be the name of a dataset or a record set derived from some filter condition, or any expression that results in a derived record set. This also may be the keyword GROUP to indicate finding the minimum value of the field in a group, when used in a RECORD structure to generate crosstab statistics.
The expression to find the minimum value of.
Optional. Specifies the activity is part of an index read operation, which allows the optimizer to generate optimal code for the operation.
A comma-delimited list of expressions to find the minimum value of. This may also be a SET of values.

sect1.para: The MIN function either returns the minimum value from the specified recordset or the valuelist. It is defined to return zero if the recordset is empty.
